stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (core_intrinsics)intrinsics are unlikely to ever be stabilized, instead they should be used through stabilized interfaces in the rest of the standard library

apiDescription: Returns true if the actual type given as T requires drop glue; returns false if the actual type provided for T implements Copy.
If the actual type neither requires drop glue nor implements Copy, then may return true or false.
The stabilized version of this intrinsic is std::mem::needs_drop.
